about.heading: Hello World!
about.content:
I'm Sebastián Soraire, Systems Analyst, future Systems Engineer and React Frontend Developer (Semi-Senior). Beyond the titles, I'm deeply curious and passionate about technology and how it can improve people's lives using Engineering.
I've been working in IT for more than eight years. Since I was a kid, I loved building things; today I find in development and engineering that same creative spirit, amplified by the ability to generate real impact.
For the last three years I’ve been part of an Argentinian fintech, where I grew both technically and personally. My leaders have highlighted my empathy, commitment and proactivity, values I bring to every project.
I'm currently finishing my Systems Engineering degree and strengthening my stack with Node.js and Next.js. I’m also improving my English in pursuit of excellence.
I’m passionate about designing complete solutions: from understanding the problem and proposing the right architecture, to implementing, testing, and iterating under agile methodologies (SCRUM) with user feedback.
In recent years, I’ve worked on my soft skills – leadership, communication and teamwork. Training in neuroscience and psychology helped me understand how emotions, awareness and empathy enhance collective performance.
Today I seek new challenges where I can merge my two main drives: technology and the human factor.

frontend.javascript: The fundamental language of modern web development. Enables interactive experiences in the browser and connects logic with design.
frontend.typescript: A superset of JavaScript that adds static typing and advanced tooling. Improves scalability, readability and maintainability in large projects.
frontend.react1: A declarative library by Meta to build dynamic, reusable UIs for the web. Great for SPAs with high performance through an efficient Virtual DOM.
frontend.react2: A framework based on React JS to build native mobile apps with JavaScript and React. Compiles to native components for high performance and a near-native experience.
frontend.next: A React framework that enables SSR and SSG. Optimizes SEO and speeds up page loads.
frontend.html: Markup language that defines the base structure of any website. Foundation for content, accessibility and document semantics.

backend.nodejs: JavaScript runtime for the server side. Great for fast, scalable apps thanks to its asynchronous, event-driven model.
backend.c-sharp: Modern, strongly-typed OOP language by Microsoft. Ideal for enterprise apps, APIs and .NET development.
backend.python: Versatile, expressive language with simple syntax. Widely used in backend, data analysis, AI and automation.
backend.php: Mature, reliable language for dynamic web apps. Popular in LAMP stacks and CMSs such as WordPress or Laravel.

database.sqlServer: Robust Microsoft solution for database management. High performance, security and built-in analytics tools.
database.postgress: Advanced open-source relational database. Supports complex queries, transactional integrity and powerful extensions.
database.git: Distributed version control to manage code changes, collaborate and keep full development history.
database.vite: Ultra-fast dev tool replacing traditional bundlers. Instant HMR and efficient builds for modern frontend projects.
